body.p: Use the Additional XSLT Stylesheets button in the XSLT tab to display a list of additional XSLT stylesheets to be used in the transformation and you can add files to the list or edit existing entries. The following actions are available:

dlentry.dd: Adds a stylesheet in the Additional XSLT stylesheets list using a file browser dialog box. You can type an editor variable in the file name field of the browser dialog box. The name of the stylesheet will be added in the list after the current selection.
Deletes the selected stylesheet from the Additional XSLT stylesheets list.
Opens the selected stylesheet in a separate view.
Moves the selected stylesheet up in the list.
Moves the selected stylesheet down in the list.
